ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [EQ_Tinkering] thermal cloak]
ygData.msgSnippet: you can tinker @ lvl 1! my brother is a lvl 4 gnome enchanter and makes fireworks all day long to sell in EC @ tunnell. he has like 400pp already! A gnome
ygData.messageBody:
you can tinker @ lvl 1!
my brother is a lvl 4 gnome enchanter and makes fireworks all day long to sell
in EC @ tunnell. he has like 400pp already!
A gnome starts 50@ tinkering on birth.
Barry
Dominiono 13 necro-gnome /Quellious
